CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This kind of side - chain donor - acceptor ( D-A ) polymer exhibited better solution processability , lower HOMO level ( -5.34 eV ) , and more balanced carrier mobility relative to its corresponding mainchain D-A conjugated polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| side-chain D-A polymer |
| corresponding mainchain D-A conjugated polymers |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "side-chain D-A polymer" and "corresponding mainchain D-A conjugated polymers". These terms are mentioned as materials being compared in terms of their properties.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| side-chain D-A polymer |

In this paragraph, the only clear "Material Name" entity is "side-chain D-A polymer". The term "corresponding mainchain D-A conjugated polymers" is not a clear material name as it is mentioned in relation to the first material and lacks specificity.
